p: Four focus groups (FG) were carried out in order to identify critical trends for the elaboration of adaptation visions: firstly, one session in the capital city with local experts in CC and stakeholders interested in climate policy, followed by three sessions with citizens which were held in different municipalities of the island. The FG sessions were carried out as described in Fig. 2. Two different strategies were applied to introduce the project and conduct the discussions, given the different needs of the participants.
